title: NFL: Would move Vikings-Rams to AZ if necessary
description: As wildfires continue to devastate several areas across Los Angeles, the NFL is preparing for Monday night's wild-card playoff game between the Vikings and Rams to take place as scheduled at SoFi Stadium, but would move the game to Arizona if necessary.
author: Lindsey Thiry

title: Sources: Belichick, UNC get UConn transfer Yates
description: UConn defensive lineman Pryce Yates signed with North Carolina, sources told ESPN.
author: Max Olson

title: The Cavs are leaving the league behind with this winning formula
description: Cleveland went 12-1 in December and cruises into tonight's marquee matchup with the Thunder on a 10-game win streak. How are they doing it?
author: Yahoo Sports

title: Legendary announcer Dick Vitale said he is cancer free, ready to call games for ESPN again
description: Dick Vitale has gone through numerous cancer battles in recent years.
author: Yahoo Sports

title: West Ham set to appoint Potter after sacking Lopetegui
description: West Ham are expected to confirm the appointment of Graham Potter as their new head coach after sacking Julen Lopetegui on Wednesday.

title: Do Mainoo and Garnacho both have futures at Man Utd?
description: Kobbie Mainoo has no concerns over his Manchester United future, Sky Sports News understands, amid reports the club may need to cash in on academy players to comply with financial rules.

title: 'Bergvall is headline act as young Spurs show incredible maturity'
description: Tottenham's trio of young stars give Postecoglou the perfect tonic with Carabao Cup semi-final win against Liverpool.

title: Tottenham's Bentancur taken off on stretcher after injury against Liverpool
description: Tottenham midfielder Rodrigo Bentancur is taken off on a stretcher just six minutes into Wednesday's Carabao Cup semi-final first leg against Liverpool.
